Key Match Events: Zimbabwe defeated India by 13 runs in the first T20I match
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was India's first loss in T20Is in 2024 and first against Zimbabwe in eight years
Others: Wellington Masakadza, a veteran of 90 T20Is, said the home team will exploit the home conditions to win the series
Ravi Bishnoi and Washington Sundar are good spinners in the Indian team
Zimbabwe spinner Wellington Masakadza finished with figures of 1/15 in three overs
Sikandar Raza, the Zimbabwe captain, played for Punjab Kings this IPL season and scored 43 runs in two games
Sikandar Raza was adjudged 'Player of the Match' for taking three wickets and scoring 17 runs in the first T20I match
